results.title: The effect of simvastatin on chemotactic capability of SDF-1alpha and the promotion of bone regeneration.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ enhanced the chemotactic capability of SDF-1alpha and the cell-free bone tissue engineering system composed of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@, SDF-1alpha and scaffold promoted bone regeneration in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ critical-sized @<m>DISEASE_Calvarial_hyperostosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537963 @@@calvarial defects@@@.

results.title: Combination of simvastatin, calcium silicate/gypsum, and gelatin and bone regeneration in rabbit calvarial defects
results.text_hl: Results demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was released from @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-loaded CS-GEL efficiently and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-loaded CS-GEL promoted new bone formation in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbit@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Calvarial_hyperostosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537963 @@@calvarial defects@@@.
